column10: 职位描述：IntroductionAt IBM, work is more than a job - it's a calling: To build. To design. To code. To consult. To think along with clients and sell. To make markets. To invent. To collaborate. Not just to do something better, but to attempt things you've never thought possible. Are you ready to lead in this new era of technology and solve some of the world's most challenging problems? If so, lets talk.Your Role and Responsibilities您将负责大数据分析，运维ELK系统，服务于平台监控，服务水平指标管理，问题和变更管理，安全工具管理等内容，希望您熟悉自动化工具，并具有一定的开发能力。Required Technical and Professional Expertise1. 熟悉ELK （Elastic Search/Logstash/Kibana/Kafka/Grafana）等开源系统。熟练掌握CentOS等Linux的操作系统管理。2. 熟悉脚本和编程语言，包括Python，Golang等。3. 熟悉Kubernetes和Docker的管理及使用，熟练使用普罗米修斯（Prometheus）对Kubernetes及docker的监控。4. 能够使用各种工具(如tcpdump、源代码调试、日志收集和处理、metrics收集和健康监控)对系统、服务和网络进行诊断并排除故障。5. 本科及以上学历，且具有1到2年大数据运维开发工作经验基本技能： 英语听说读写熟练，有一定团队工作能力，擅于沟通。Preferred Technical and Professional Expertisenone为了回应您对职位的申请或兴趣，IBM 将使用您的信息来评估您的技能、资格；核实您的信息并进行相关适用的法律允许的职前验证检查； 就新职位与职业机会以及招聘流程（包括任何面试）与您进行沟通；完成选拔过程；开展调查和研究活动，以改进 IBM 的招聘流程；以及对我们的申请人群体进行分析，以便更好地了解谁在申请 IBM 职位以及如何吸引顶尖人才。如果您的申请未成功，IBM 可能会使用您的联系信息来通知您未来可能会有的 、IBM 认为您可能会感兴趣的不同职位。提交您的申请，即表示您授权您所申请的 IBM 公司（在“职位公告”中列出）将您的个人数据存储在 IBM 的招聘工具中，以在评估您的申请时以及其他方式安全地存储您的数据。未经您事先同意，IBM 将不会与任何第三方共享您的个人数据。如果您收到并接受 IBM 提供的职位邀请，那么在您职前阶段收集到的个人数据将成为您的 IBM 人事档案的一部分，并将于您在 IBM 任职期间及之后一段时间内保留（具体期限因国家或地区而异）。

column10: 职位描述：职责描述：61	Build/scale and optimize Linux infrastructure on VMWare, Aliyun and Docker(K8s) environments;配置、调整、优化VMWare、Aliyun、Docker（K8s）环境；61	Accountable for maintaining the stability and performance of run time environments;确保系统环境高效、稳定地运行；61	Developing scripts to automate repetitive tasks or tools to enhance support of Linux systems;编写、维护、部署自动化脚本，最大化地实现重复任务的自动化运维；61	Focus on analyzing data, supporting application and system outages and providing guidance to solve complex issues;在应用及系统出现生产环境故障时，有能力分析并解决复杂问题；61	Provide on-call support on a rotational basis as assigned.轮值7X24小时电话支持。任职要求：61	Work as a Linux expert in the team;成为团队中Linux领域的专家；61	Work closely with technical SME'S who are responsible for improving the stability and performance of critical systems;与其他技术主题专家合作，提高核心系统的稳定性及性能；61	Understanding security best practices and proactively looking to strengthen security posture;了解安全最佳实践，主动地发现并修复系统安全漏洞；61	Develop and maintain operation documentation, disaster recover documentation and standard operating procedures;撰写并维护运维文档、灾难恢复文档、标准操作文档等；61	Sustain learning and knowledge sharing culture in the organization and aim at achieving a high level of technical excellence and stability.热爱学习、乐于分享，对提升自身技能有强烈的愿望。Qualifications/Knowledge, Skills & Abilities Requirements任职资格/知识，技能及能力要求61	5+ years of Linux systems administration experience in supporting critical production environments;5年以上Linux关键生产环境的系统管理经验；61	Maintain and manage all aspects of Linux server maintenance from OS installation and middleware configuration to patch updates on a timely basis;管理各种Linux服务器相关的运维工作，如操作系统安装、中间件的配置、定期系统更新等；61	Familiar with Ansible (or equivalent) as system management and configuration tool;熟悉用Ansible（或同类产品）执行自动化系统配置管理；61	Hands-on experience with automation scripting, and infrastructure-as-code;有Infrastructure-as-Code自动化运维经验；61	Ability to utilize a scripting language (e.g., Bash, Perl, Python, Ansible) to automate regular tasks and processes;熟悉常用脚本语言（如Bash，Perl，Python，Ansible等），并善于编写自动化运维脚本；61	Strong understanding of network concepts including TCP/IP, HTTP and TLS, DDoS detection/prevention, and network and host anomaly detection through both automated and manual means;拥有扎实的网络知识，对TCP/IP、HTTP、TLS等技术拥有深刻的理解，能够对DDoS等攻击进行侦测与防范，能够通过自动与手动方式排查网络异常；61	Programming experience in one or several of the following languages (JavaScript, Perl, Python or Ruby;)对至少一门脚本语言有较为深刻的理解（JavaScript, Perl, Python, Ruby）61	Solid understanding of Storage concepts including FC, iSCSI, LVM and NFS;对常见存储技术如FC、iSCSI、LVM、NFS等的理解；61	Proven ability to balance multiple priorities and communicate across organizational boundaries;具有良好的跨职能、跨部门沟通能力；61	Understand security best practices and proactively suggest improvements.具有良好的安全意识，能够主动提出安全最佳实践方面的意见。

column2: 普华永道信息技术
column8: 本科及以上经验不限语言不限 年龄不限
column9: 发展空间大公司规模大弹性工作远程办公
column10: 职位描述：Job Responsibilities:岗位职责1. Builds software applications by following coding standards, builds appropriate unittests, integration tests and deployment scripts.通过遵循编码标准构建软件应用程序，构建适当的单元测试、集成测试和部署脚本。2. Assists in defining software architectures C Collaborates with leads to explore existing systems, determines areas of complexity, potential risks to successfulimplementation, learns the applications capabilities.协助定义软件架构C与组织者合作，探索现有系统，制定成功执行程序的风险区间和复杂程度，并学习应用程序功能。3. Integration of user-facing elements developed by front-end developers with server side logic具有服务器端逻辑的前端开发人员开发面向客户的集成元素。4. Design and implementation of low-latency, high-availability, and performance applications设计和实施低延迟、高可用性和高性能应用程序。5. Assist PM to delivery projects on time, within planned budget and required qualitylevel. Prepare staffing plan & allotment of resources.协助项目经理在计划预算和要求的质量范围内按时交付项目水平。准备人员配备计划并分配资源。6. Integration of data storage solutions including databases, key-value stores, blob stores, etc.数据存储解决方案的集成，包括数据库、键值存储、blob存储等。7. Owns success C Takes responsibility for successful delivery of the solutions.拥有成功C负责解决方案的成功交付。8. Contributes to continual improvement by suggesting improvements to user interface,software architecture or new technologies.通过对用户界面提出改进建议来促进持续改进，软件架构或新技术。Job Requirements:岗位要求：1. Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology or related area(equivalent work experience will be considered).拥有计算机科学、信息技术或相关领域学士学位（可考虑拥有同等工作经验者）。2. Above 2+ years experience developing business applications in a full software development life cycle environment using web technologies.拥有2年以上使用网络技术在完整的软件开发生命周期环境中开发业务应用的经验。3.Experienced in C＃Asp.net, more than 2 years project experience in React/Angular（2/4/5/6/7/8）精通C＃Asp.net，使用React/Angular（2/4/5/6/7/8）框架2年以上的项目经验。4.Solid experience with node.js, express.js, Koa, egg.js, JWT, server-side templating languages拥有丰富的节点、js、express.js、Koa、egg.js、JWT、服务器端模板语言经验。5.Basic understanding of front-end technologies, such as HTML5, and CSS3对前端技术例如HTML5和CSS3有基本了解。6.Experience in messaging middleware like RabbitMQ, Kafka拥有在消息中间件方面的经验，如RabbitMQ, Kafka。7.Experience in Docker, Kubernetes is a plus.有使用Docker, Kubernetes经验者优先。8. Experience with relational databases such as MySQL, MongoDB, Oracle, SQL Server or other opensource databases.有使用关系数据库的经验，如MySQL、MongoDB、Oracle、SQL Server或其他开放的源数据库。9.Experience with user authentication and authorization between multiple systems, servers, and environments有在多个系统、服务器和环境之间进行用户身份验证和授权的经验。10.Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git精通代码版本控制工具，如Git等。

Builds software applications by following coding standards, builds appropriate unittests, integration tests and deployment scripts.通过遵循编码标准构建软件应用程序，构建适当的单元测试、集成测试和部署脚本。2. Assists in defining software architectures C Collaborates with leads to explore existing systems, determines areas of complexity, potential risks to successfulimplementation, learns the applications capabilities.协助定义软件架构C与组织者合作，探索现有系统，制定成功执行程序的风险区间和复杂程度，并学习应用程序功能。3. Integration of user-facing elements developed by front-end developers with server side logic具有服务器端逻辑的前端开发人员开发面向客户的集成元素。4. Design and implementation of low-latency, high-availability, and performance applications设计和实施低延迟、高可用性和高性能应用程序。5. Assist PM to delivery projects on time, within planned budget and required qualitylevel. Prepare staffing plan & allotment of resources.协助项目经理在计划预算和要求的质量范围内按时交付项目水平。准备人员配备计划并分配资源。6. Integration of data storage solutions including databases, key-value stores, blob stores, etc.数据存储解决方案的集成，包括数据库、键值存储、blob存储等。7. Owns success C Takes responsibility for successful delivery of the solutions.拥有成功C负责解决方案的成功交付。8. Contributes to continual improvement by suggesting improvements to user interface,software architecture or new technologies.通过对用户界面提出改进建议来促进持续改进，软件架构或新技术。Job Requirements:岗位要求：1. Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology or related area(equivalent work experience will be considered).拥有计算机科学、信息技术或相关领域学士学位（可考虑拥有同等工作经验者）。2. Above 2+ years experience developing business applications in a full software development life cycle environment using web technologies.拥有2年以上使用网络技术在完整的软件开发生命周期环境中开发业务应用的经验。3.Experienced in C＃Asp.net, more than 2 years project experience in React/Angular（2/4/5/6/7/8）精通C＃Asp.net，使用React/Angular（2/4/5/6/7/8）框架2年以上的项目经验。4.Solid experience with node.js, express.js, Koa, egg.js, JWT, server-side templating languages拥有丰富的节点、js、express.js、Koa、egg.js、JWT、服务器端模板语言经验。5.Basic understanding of front-end technologies, such as HTML5, and CSS3对前端技术例如HTML5和CSS3有基本了解。6.Experience in messaging middleware like RabbitMQ, Kafka拥有在消息中间件方面的经验，如RabbitMQ, Kafka。7.Experience in Docker, Kubernetes is a plus.有使用Docker, Kubernetes经验者优先。8. Experience with relational databases such as MySQL, MongoDB, Oracle, SQL Server or other opensource databases.有使用关系数据库的经验，如MySQL、MongoDB、Oracle、SQL Server或其他开放的源数据库。9.Experience with user authentication and authorization between multiple systems, servers, and environments有在多个系统、服务器和环境之间进行用户身份验证和授权的经验。10.Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git精通代码版本控制工具，如Git等。

column10: 职位描述：负责保险金融类业务场景数字化IT产品（以APP为主）的后端开发。要求：1. 全日制本科以上学历，计算机相关专业，985/211院校优先。2. ５年以上后端开发经验，熟练Java，Spring boot, Spring Cloud, 微服务架构及API开发等。3. 英文良好。What We’re Looking ForAs a Software Engineer, you’ll be responsible for design, develop and deliver usable, adaptable, reliable, and secure business software solutions to contribute to the regional business growth. You will apply the latest agile development methodology and process to deliver software with speed and quality. You will work in an energetic project team in a start-up like setting to contribute to the success of our digital initiative. You should be excellent communication and documentation skills.What You Will Generally Be Doing61 Drive the detail design of technical solutions based on business requirements, technology roadmap and other constraints61 Hands on development using Test Driven Development61 Drive a high quality and high performance culture by applying proper development process61 Make sure that the deliverable are of highest quality and professionalism.61 Escalation management: act as primary contact of escalations of any kind of issues within the project.61 Drive continuous process improvements61 Design and document professional APIs that follow the standard and best practices61 Design and develop microservices or serverless back-end systems61 Develop web frontend with latest web framework and technologies.61 Perform code review and maintain coding standards and best practices61 Create automated tests and unit tests61 Prepare technical documentations, including technical proposal, design document, etc.61 Develop CI/CD pipeline for software to be deployed to cloud platforms61 Maintain production systems and investigate issues when they occur61 Create tools and processes to automate our development, testing, and production workflows61 Build rapid prototyping and development to test innovative ideas in the market.61 Taking lead on projects, as needed.What You Will Need● Minimum 5+ years of proven work experience in software development● Experience working in a product-oriented, team-based environment that uses modern digital delivery approaches such as user experience design, lean, agile, DevOps, and cloud computing● Experience working in a technical environment that makes use of languages, frameworks, techniques, and technologies such as Java, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, Node.js, React, Angular, Python, Spring, Spring Boot, REST APIs, JSON, MSSQL, MySQL, NoSQL, Couchbase, MongoDB, Git, Bitbucket, Redis, Jenkins, Bamboo, Docker, Azure, Terraform, Kafka, MQ● Hands-on programming, coding, debugging and monitoring● Solid experience in Java and OOP● Strong experience and knowledge in API, system integration, microservices, business reporting, software engineering concepts and best practices● Experience in microservices design pattern● Experience in Docker and Kubernetes● Experience in Serverless technology is an advantage.● Experience in development with Cloud based services (Azure, AWS, GCP, etc.). Experience in Azure will be an advantage.● Familiar in pub/sub and event driven style development (Kafka, MQ, Azure Event Hub, etc.)● Strong analytical mind and logical thinking● Excellent analytical and time management skills● Teamwork skills with a problem-solving attitude● “Can do” mentality● You speak English and Mandarin fluently and can communicate and present professionally with ease. Knowledge of Cantonese is an advantage.● You have proven ability to simplify and navigate in highly ambiguous situations● Bachelors or Masters in Computer Science or Engineering, or equivalent relevant technical field.

column10: 职位描述：职责描述：1.负责公司门户、运营平台、公众号、小程序的功能开发和维护；2.负责工业互联网平台的运维管理和技术支持；3.负责结合工业互联网平台，参与智能制造项目的方案设计、规划，并参与项目实施落地；4.负责对接平台的合作伙伴完成各应用和方案的技术对接；5.参与运营平台和工业物联网平台集成架构设计。任职要求：1.JAVA基础扎实，熟悉IO、多线程、分布式、缓存、消息等机制；2.熟练掌握并运用SpringMVC、Spring boot、Mybatis等框架进行JAVA项目开发；3.熟悉Mysql，熟悉SQL语言，能管理、性能调优和维护数据库；4.熟悉Docker容器技术，负责Docker的部署、优化；5.了解Linux操作系统，熟悉常用操作命令,具有线上服务运维和调优经验者优先；6.对智能制造、工业互联等概念有一定理解者优先；7.工作态度积极向上、吃苦耐劳、自学能力强。

column10: 职位描述： 一、Key Responsibilities主要职责1.  Industrial software system project management; 工业软件系统项目管理；2.  Bussiness flow analysis & optimization; 业务流程分析、改善；3.  Industrial software system development with supplier, such as WMS, PLM, ERP, MES etc.; 与供应商合作开发工业软件系统，如仓库管理系统、产品生命周期管理系统、企业资源计划系统、制造执行系统等；4.  Industrial software system implementation coordinator; 协调实施工业软件系统；5.  Industrial software system user training & documents coordinator; 协调工业软件系统用户培训、建立相关文档；6.  Industrial software system maintenance; 工业软件系统应用程序维护；7.  Database maintenance; 数据库维护；8.  Related hardware maintenance, such as: data center, production network, user terminal etc. 系统硬件维护，包括数据中心、生产网络、用户终端等；9.  Industrial software system secondary development requirement assessment; 工业软件系统二次开发需求评估； 10.Industrial software system secondary development for expendary function, reprot, user interface; 工业软件系统二次开发，包括功能扩展、报表、用户界面等；11.Industrial software system integration, and supply SDK; 工业软件系统集成，并提供软件开发包；12.Intelligent Manufacturing study for system optimization; 智能制造技术研究，并改善相关软件；13.Small Production IT tools development; 生产信息化小工具开发；14.Other work assigned by Manager. 领导交办的其他工作。二、Qualifications      任职资格1、Bachelor degree or above. Related Major in Comupter science & technology, Software engineering本科及以上学历,Related Major in Comupter science & technology, Software engineering 计算机科学与技术、软件工程相关专业。2、At least 3 years WMS, PLM, ERP, MES development & maintenance experience, automotive industry experience is preferred. 3年及以上仓库管理系统、产品生命周期管理系统、企业资源计划系统、制造执行系统开发运维经验，有汽车行业工作经验者优先。3、 Familiar with WMS, PLM, ERP, MES;熟悉仓库管理系统、产品生命周期管理系统、企业资源计划系统、制造执行系统；4.  Familiar with automotive manufacturing bussiness flow;熟悉汽车制造行业业务流程；5.  Proficiency in Industrial software system development;精通工业软件系统开发；6.  Familiar with Production IT hardware maintenance;熟悉生产信息化系统硬件运维；7、Familiar with project management.熟悉项目管理流程。8.  Solid experience in C# / Java, SQL, HTML5, JavaScript, JQuery etc.;熟练使用 C# / Java, SQL, HTML5, JavaScript, JQuery等；9.  Proficient in SQL Server/ORACLE databases;精通SQL或Oracle数据库；10.  Good knowledge of Virtualization, such as KVM, VMWare, Docker etc.;掌握虚拟化技术，如KVM、VMWare、Docker等；11.  Good knowledge of Network communication (TCP/UDP/socket etc);掌握网络通讯相关协议，如TCP/UDP/Socket等；

column10: 职位描述：职责描述：1. 负责IPTV和OTT平台搜索引擎、多屏消息系统、用户中心系统的相关项目架构设计、开发维护。2.对现有系统业务架构进行优化和微服务化改造。3.创新项目预研和执行落地。4.按要求完成代码的单元测试和承担必要的代码检查工作。任职要求：1、本科及以上学历， 5年以上开发PHP经验，对以下框架精通：larval、YII，有大并发服务的开发和调优经验；2、熟悉Linux开发环境，对MySQL、Nginx、MongoDB、Redis、Docker等工具熟悉；3、熟悉以下一种或多种语言，有生产环境部署和使用、调优经验：Java、Python、Golang；加分项：1、有基于Amazon AWS和阿里云开发和架构设计经验优先；2、熟悉Spring、Spring Cloud相关技术栈；3、熟悉Docker、Kubernetes、Rancher相关技术，有生产环境部署和使用经验；

column10: 职位描述：Job Summary: According to the business changes and needs, provide a proper system functional solution with estimation by assessing and analyzing those changes, capture and document requirements as functional specification, support the communication and delivery of these requirements with relevant parties and conduct System briefing and User training while needed. Work as mentor of intermediate Technical Manager. Duties/Responsibilities:  61	Deliver new IT services, exploiting current infrastructure technologies61	Manage and participate in the entire development lifecycle, including requirement analysis, system design, development, quality assurance, testing and deployment61	Contribute to the project success in terms of schedule, budget and deliverable quality61	Cultivate effective working relationships with business users and other IT teams61	Migrate applications to IaaS / PaaS platforms on internal and external cloud61	Drive a greater utilization of virtualization & lower cost storage61	Manage relationships across AIA IT Architecture, IT Infrastructure Delivery and Operations & Cyber Security Application Development team areas on an on-going basis61	Use knowledge of the business, applications and infrastructure to make pro-active recommendations where improvements can be made61	Determine business requirement and influence solution towards Infrastructure future state model61	Gauge strategic impact to business function, impacted upstream and downstream services.61	Ensure logical design contributes to technology objectives61	Delivering end to end technical infrastructure designs, ensuring Non-Functional Requirements are realized and validated61	Verify impact to adjacent services/systems and Validate deployment and support model61	Qualify technical acceptance of all componentsKey Measuring Parameters:  61	Cloud technologies: (Google GCP / Amazon AWS / Microsoft Azure, APIs, Mulesoft, Docker, Kubernetes)61	Container technologies (Docker, Kubernetes)61	Databases (Oracle RAC, Sybase, Apache Hadoop & Hbase, MongoDB)61	Continuous Integration / Continuous Delivery (Jenkins, GitHub, Nexus)61	Middleware (Websphere, Tomcat, Java, Messaging, Application Server, Web server)61	Networking (Cisco, TCP/UDP, Broadcast/Multicast, LAN/WAN, SDN)61	Server Operating systems internals, benchmarking and performance tuning (Linux, Windows, Solaris),61	Server Virtualization (VMware, Xen, Hyper-V, KVM)61	Storage (EMC SAN C FC, FCoE, iSCSI, SRDF; NetApp NAS - CIFS, NFS; Object storage)61	Infrastructure as Code61	Mobile (IOS and Android)61	Passion for technology & understanding how things work 61	People coaching skill

column10: 职位描述：主要职责 （1） 负责公司云平台后端的业务逻辑的实现，如任务计算、文件系统；（2） 针对大数据分析应用，对云平台组件、业务模块进行系统规划和架构设计并开发；（3） 与产品和前端协作编写 api 文档，并利用 api 文档实现前后端分离开发与测试；（4） 负责云平台的开发环境部署和后期项目服务上线的升级优化及 DevOps 自动化开发 及运维；（5） 和数据工程师配合进行后台数据库设计和优化；任职要求（1） 本科及以上学历，计算机相关专业优先，3 年以上的 Web 后端开发经验；（2） 熟悉 asp、php、jsp、.NET 其中的至少两种网页设计；（3） 精通使用 Python/Go /Java/ NodeJS 任一语言，有多种语言开发经历的优先；（4） 熟悉 HTML/XHTML、扎实的 JavaScript  基础，有 ES6  或 TypeScript    的经验；（5） 熟悉常见关系数据库和非关系数据库，（例如 MySQL、MongoDB、Hbase 等）及缓 存（例如 Memcache、Redis）；具备数据系统的规划设计及调优能力，熟悉分布式文件 系统和上层应用，有相关开发经验者优先；（6） 熟悉开源的自助化云服务产品：MySQL、redis、nginx、mongodb、elasticsearch、zookeeper、activemq 等；（7） 熟悉 KVM 虚拟化、OpenStack 等技术；有 docker 及微服务设计，有开源 Docker调度框架（Mesos、K8S 或 Rancher）实践经验；（8） 熟悉 Resful 接口设计，熟练使用 JSON 来处理数据；（9） 具备 Linux 服务器端开发经验，熟悉 React 、AngularJS，MVC、SpringCloud、Mybatis、 iBatis 等常用开源框架。（10） 有项目云服务化或者相关开发、迭代、实施经验，熟悉大规模、高并发系统架构设 计，熟悉云端项目的部署和维护；（11） 对技术有追求和热情，优秀的逻辑性和问题分析解决能力；（12） 具备良好的沟通能力和团队合作意识。

column10: 职位描述：Software Infrastructure Engineer【软件架构工程师】We are looking for a talented software infrastructure engineer on the behalf of our client to join in a rapidly growing team. Our client is one company with experience and expertise in a wide range of areas. You will ensure that the application’s infrastructure and deployment process is robust and scalable as the application grows. The ideal candidate is continually learning, up-to-date on the latest infrastructure architecture and DevOps processes, and constantly thinking of ways to automate systems. The continuously expanding landscape should excite rather than overwhelm you. We would like to see you that you will make a real impact with your work and want to leave your mark on a product used by hundreds of thousands of people.Your Background【背景要求】We would like to see you with a master degree in engineering, IT or similar and you should have 2-3 years of previous work experience with a proficient knowledge of python and c-based programming. As a software infrastructure engineer, you must have prior knowledge and experience of in-house developed software applications, to be involved in software releases as well as maintenance and development work of build environment and quality assurance tools.工程、IT或类似的硕士学位优先，2-3年的工作经验，精通python和基于c的编程。具备内部开发软件应用程序的知识和经验，以便参与软件发布以及构建环境和质量保证工具的维护和开发工作。Duties and Responsibilities【工作职责】● Integrate software applications● Maintain and develop build environment infrastructure● Refine, scale, and automate the software deployment pipeline● Modify and develop quality assurance tools and other tools used● Standardize and automate the setup of production and development environments● Implement/improve current application monitoring system● Discuss technical solutions with suppliers (internally/ externally)● Support technical investigations and task force activities●集成软件应用●维护和发展建筑环境基础设施●优化、扩展和自动化软件部署管道●修改和开发质量保证工具和其他工具●标准化和自动化生产和开发环境的设置●实施/改进现有的应用监控系统●与供应商(内部/外部)讨论技术解决方案●支持技术调查和工作组活动Required Qualifications【任职资格】● B.Sc. grade within computer science, engineering, or equivalent level of education● At least 2-3 years previous relevant work experience● Experience with Python, Shell Script, C/C++, Golang● Experience with source control tools such as git (and corresponding services like GitHub or GitLab)● Familiarity with Docker and container orchestration tools (e.g. Kubernetes, Docker Swarm)● Knowledge/experience with automated provisioning tools (e.g., Terraform, Ansible, Chef, Puppet, Salt)● Fluent in English in both speech and writing●计算机科学、工程或同等教育水平的学士学位，硕士学位优先●至少2-3年相关工作经验●熟悉Python, Shell Script, C/ c++， Golang●熟悉git等版本控制工具(以及相应的服务，如GitHub或GitLab)●熟悉Docker和容器编排工具(如Kubernetes, Docker Swarm)●熟悉自动化配置工具(如Terraform, Ansible, Chef, Puppet, Salt)●流利的英语口语和书写能力Meritorious Qualification【任职资格】-加分项● Experience from software integration, design and development● Experience with formal software development processes, such as Kanban and Scrum● Knowledge of cloud infrastructure architecture and deployment strategies● Experience with TDD, BDD●具有软件集成、设计和开发经验●熟悉正式的软件开发流程，如看板和Scrum●了解云基础设施架构和部署策略●有TDD、BDD经验Personal Qualities【个人特质】-加分项● Strong committed to develop world class products with high precision● Structured with good documentation and communication skills● Self-driven and reliable● Result- and business oriented● Strong team player with persistence●强力致力于开发高精密的***产品●具有良好的文档结构和沟通能力●自我驱动，可靠●以结果和业务为导向●团队合作精神强，坚持不懈
